=======================================
Taula de temps per al Projecte SimulAVR
=======================================


Mòdul Bitvec
------------


+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
|                    |   Temps a entendre   |  Temps a escriure    |     Temps a fer      |    Temps a corretgir          |
|                    |      el mòdul        |       el mòdul       |     els doctest      |           errors              |
+====================+======================+======================+======================+===============================+
| **Héctor Vidal**   |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **Sergi Carol**    |           0          |           0          |           0          |          1H                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **Pavel Macutela** |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **David Martín**   |           1H         |           3H         |           2H         |           1H                  |                
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **Enric Caballé**  |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+

------------


+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
|                    |   Temps a entendre   |  Temps a escriure    |     Temps a fer      |    Temps a corretgir          |
|                    |      el mòdul        |       el mòdul       |     els doctest      |           errors              |
+====================+======================+======================+======================+===============================+
| **Héctor Vidal**   |          0           |            0         |           0          |           0                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **Sergi Carol**    |           0:30       |           2:30       |           1H         |           0                   |                   
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+-------------------------------+
| **Pavel Macutela** |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |

| **David Martín**   |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |

| **Enric Caballé**  |           0          |           0          |           0          |           0                   |

|                    |   Temps a entendre   |  Temps a escriure    |     Temps a fer      |    Temps a corretgir          |

Documentació i altres
---------------------

+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
|                    |   Temps dedicat a    |    Temps dedicat al  |     Temps dedicat    |    
|                    |      documentar      |         sphinx       |       al despatx     |          
+====================+======================+======================+======================+
| **Héctor Vidal**   |           0          |           0          |          0:40        |                                                 
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| **Sergi Carol**    |           0          |           0          |          2:00        |                                                  
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| **Pavel Macutela** |          3:00        |           3          |           0          |                                                  
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| **David Martín**   |          1           |           1          |           1          |                                               
+--------------------+----------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
| **Enric Caballé**  |          3:00        |          2:30        |           0          |
